channel.title: Crowns
channel.description: I have an idea of giving players crowns. Next to their name like admin and mod crowns. So, I have this thing on my server where they can go into prestige mode on my server. But, I want to add prestige crowns when they go into prestige mode. And I want to make my owner crown work in the server. I already have the crown, but how do I make it show up for player rights = 3? This is 317 dleta base(I don't give a shit what you think about delta base's).

item.title: Crowns
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I have an idea of giving players crowns. Next to their name like admin and mod crowns. So, I have this thing on my server where they can go into prestige mode on my server. But, I want to add prestige crowns when they go into prestige mode. And I want to make my owner crown work in the server. I already have the crown, but how do I make it show up for player rights = 3? This is 317 dleta base(I don’t give a shit what you think about delta base’s).

Read full topic
